metadata.title: CVE-2021-32435 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the function get_key in parse.c of abcm2psv8.14.11 allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 8.14.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.14.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
